additionalProperties.description: The registry associating structure locations with generated Jigsaw structure metadata.

metadata.description: The registry associating structure locations with generated Jigsaw structure metadata.

markers.description: The Jigsaw blocks contained within the generated structure.

use_legacy_rotation.description: Unused - Previously if true would use legacy size rotation.

block.description: The serialization Id of the Jigsaw block before generation.

final_block.description: The serialization Id to replace the starting Jigsaw block with.

joint_type.description: The type of Jigsaw joint made with 'target'.
joint_type.title: Jigsaw Joint Type

name.description: The name identifier referenced by the 'target' field of another Jigsaw block.

placement_priority.description: The priority used during target block placement.

pool.description: The structure template pool containing possible structures to generate.

selection_priority.description: The priority used during target block selection.

target.description: The name identifier of the Jigsaw block to target within the generated structure.

format_version.description: Format version of the contained metadata registry.
